overview:
Valentin is an experienced manager and web professional. He is currently founding his Zappos-like shoe business in Switzerland.

Valentin’s experience comes from his eBay years in Finance, Strategy and Business Development roles at country (Belgium) and regional (Europe) levels. Lately, he was responsible as a Business Owner for the launch of eBay Portugal, Finland and Hungary, as well as a Classified site on eBay.ru.

Before that, Valentin worked in consulting with Bain & Co, and has an MBA from INSEAD Business School in Fontainebleau and Singapore.
